thread.title: Kate Hudson posts wardrobe malfunction online
thread.title_full: Kate Hudson posts wardrobe malfunction online

title: Kate Hudson posts wardrobe malfunction online
text:
Report an error 
Kate Hudson caught one of her most embarrassing moments on camera on Tuesday night - and posted it online for all to see. 
The Almost Famous star suffered a wardrobe malfunction during a trip to the restroom at the 50th anniversary celebration of La Mer skincare and needed help from her celebrity pals. 
Hudson realized at the last minute her floral-print Yanina gown was tricky to get out of when you need to visit the ladies room - and pals like Gwyneth Paltrow had to help her get the dress over her head. 
The actress stopped them halfway so she could snap a selfie of her struggle and post it on social media with the caption: "When you can't get out of your dress whilst trying to go..." 
A photo posted by Kate Hudson (@katehudson) on Oct 13, 2015 at 11:25pm PDT Sponsored Links
